item.title: Hydraulic System Low Qty or RSVR Lights – HYD QTY Indications Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated HYD QTY indication is operative.

placard.para: Placard affected RSVR light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Check EICAS status indication of HYD QTY for affected system.
Reference EICAS maintenance page. RSVR PRESS will indicate LOW, NORM or HIGH for each system.

note.para: If, after engine start, the L, C, or R HYD RSVR PRES EICAS message illuminates (indicating LOW air pressure) dispatch is not allowed.
